title: Nutritional Host Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Crozer Health in Aug 2022
Interview Descriptions: A few questions were asked about availability and experience in the hospital setting. We talked about what a typical day would look like and what the shifts were like. I

title: Resident Physician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Crozer Health
Interview Descriptions: The day started in the morning at the outpatient facility. Then the program director did a presentation regarding the residency program itself and the hospital. From there, multiple rounds of interviews that consisted amongst the faculty and some of the residents. After that, we then went to the hospital to get a tour

title: FT Night RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Crozer Health in Nov 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview was completely laid back. We discussed the hospital in great detail and the floor I would be working on.   The interviewer was very informative and extremely knowledgeable about the hospital.   Heard back with an offer in two days.
Interview Questions:
What am I looking for in a unit?
What Do I know about the hospital?

title: HR Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Crozer Health
Interview Descriptions:
-Quick phone screen to set up appointment
-In person interview with employer (asked to share about your experiences and education)
-Skype interview with upper management (Why are you a good fit? Do you have strong time management skills)
Interview Questions: Q: What made you apply for this position?

title: Independent Contractor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Crozer Health (Philadelphia, PA) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: the interview process was okay however they still want you to complete a typing test. This is so outdated and they need to upgrade their systems. Other than that the interview was a complete success.

title: Nutrition Services Aide Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Crozer Health (Drexel Hill, PA) in May 2018
Interview Descriptions: Applied online and got a call back in a few hours! Interview went well, there were two ppl..asked basic questions..tell me about yourself, about your last job,Why do u wanna work for our company, what's your ability,are you willing to work In Different departments.. I still haven't officially started... Waiting to get my fingerprints done for FBI clearance.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work out company

title: Graduate Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at Crozer Health (Philadelphia, PA) in Mar 2018
Interview Descriptions: I applied and heard back about 2 weeks later with a phone call. They set up an interview for about a week and a half after that. I was interviewed by 3 people (but another girl was only interviewed by 1).

title: Physician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Crozer Health
Interview Descriptions: Disorganized. There was minimal communication before the interview date. On the day of the interview, I was given an agenda, but it was useless because the day did not follow the agenda.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Security Interview Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Crozer Health in Feb 2018
Interview Descriptions: A Big joke! The whole time they already knew who they wanted.  There was no opening.   It was just a "Going through the motions interview" Stop wasting peoples time.

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Crozer Health
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was panel style for first round. Second round was with a physician in the primary department that I would of been working in. All in all it didn't feel like a good fit for me

title: Pct Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Crozer Health
Interview Descriptions: I put in an application online. Was called in to have an interview and was hired on the spot. Through networking inside the hospital I got a position on the floors as a Patient Care Tech.

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Crozer Health (Philadelphia, PA) in Jun 2016
Interview Descriptions: the interview process was well-organized, respectful people, highly professional environment. all the necessary information was provided by the health system. both practical and theoretical applications was made available to prospective candidate

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Crozer Health (Philadelphia, PA) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: Supplemental staffing- Open house event which led to a 1:1 interview. They checked my background and had me take a test for competence.  The entire process took a few weeks.

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Crozer Health (Ridley Park, PA) in Apr 2015
Interview Descriptions: It takes a month for a call back. But the interview was like a speed interview with multiple people interviewed at the same time in one big room. It was a little weird.
Interview Questions: What would tou do if a doctor wont order something?

title: Patient Care Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Crozer Health (Upland, Chester, PA) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: why you chose Crozer, how do you deal with difficult co-workers, what would you do if someone talked about about another employee and can you deal with a fast paced environment

title: Financial Services Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Crozer Health (Chester, PA) in Dec 2014
Interview Descriptions: Found job on social media. Applied. Phone interview with HR. Then 2 face to face interviews.had to get physical and drug test. Checked references.proccess was a little slow but the told me it woul

title: Radiology Tech Aide Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Crozer Health (Chester, PA) in Jun 2014
Interview Descriptions: The interview was taken place in the employee break room in Crozer's MRI department. It went very well, the person who interviewed me was very professional, easy to talk to and informative. Aside from the interview, the hiring process took about 3 months until I was able to start working.
Interview Questions: Past job history and customer service experience.

title: ED Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 7 weeks. I interviewed at Crozer Health
Interview Descriptions: Difficult online application process but once interviewed things moved quickly

title: Medical Assistant/Phlebotomist Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Crozer Health (Glen Mills, PA) in Sept 2013
Interview Descriptions: There wasn't much of an interview process since I was place from school as an extern and was hired based on my performance. I was promised quick advancement, with my non-related but strong work history.
Interview Questions: Since I was being hired off of an externship the interview was basically non-existent. Just a couple quick questions regarding the hourly rate, the need to get a drug test and some formal training.

title: Care Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Crozer Health (Chester, PA) in Aug 2013
Interview Descriptions: I submitted resume internally, then received a phone call from HR, asking for references.  I provided 3 names and numbers, and then was contacted to arrange for in person interviews with 3 people.  I met with all 3 briefly, and then each one at a time.  It was comfortable, and there were no exceedingly tricky questions.
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in this position?

title: RN Care Specialist Interview
Application Type: The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Crozer Health (Springfield, PA) in Sept 2011
Interview Descriptions:
Interviewed 1:1 with manager at initial interview.  In first minute of interview - she banged hand on table and said if you are here to work  only 8-4 everyday and if  you are not motivated or flexible - then there is the door!  For the next 10 minutes she elaborated about her credentials.  i asked for duties of the position, but never received a direct answer.  Then 1 hour into the interview she spoke to a woman outside the conference room "to round the troops up".   A few minutes later she leaned toward me and said "my people are going to come in and interview you - if they don't like you, then you don't get hired!  It is as simple as that.  
Interviewed with other team members, but was not offered the job.
Interview Questions: what are you like -tell me all your negative qualities and problems.   Just lay it all out on the table?
